DOC.brief_summary: Prospective, observational cohort study evaluating the association between pre-surgical existence of an epiretinal membrane (ERM) and the development of pseudophakic cystoid macular edema (PCME) using spectral domain optical coherence tomography (OCT) measurements.
DOC.brief_title: Epiretinal Membrane and Pseudophakic Cystoid Macular Edema
DOC.criteria: 18 years or older Cataract surgery patients Preexisting macular edema Choroidal neovascularization Uveitis Agerelated macular degeneration Myopia > 6 diopters Proliferative diabetic retinopathy Diabetics retinopathy great than mild in serverity
